# LuxDL Docs

> Elegant & Performant Deep Learning in JuliaLang

Model with the elegance of Julia, and the performance of XLA.

## Table of Contents

### Getting Started

- [Introduction {#getting-started}](/dev/introduction.md)
- [Why we wrote Lux? {#Why-we-wrote-Lux?}](/dev/introduction/overview.md)

- [Updating to Lux v1 {#updating-to-v1}](/dev/introduction/updating_to_v1.md)
- [Citation {#Citation}](/dev/introduction/citation.md)

- [Building a LSTM Encoder-Decoder model using Lux.jl {#Building-a-LSTM-Encoder-Decoder-model-using-Lux.jl}](/dev/tutorials/intermediate/8_LSTMEncoderDecoder.md)
